insert into t_user (username, password, dept_id, email, mobile, status, create_time, modify_time, last_login_time, ssex, description, avatar, type, token) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssex = #{ssex,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, dept_id, email, mobile, status, create_time, modify_time, last_login_time, ssex, description, avatar, type, token from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
